targets.query:
currentSeconds = (int(v: now()) / 1000000000)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "summary" and r._field == "gravity_last_updated")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: currentSeconds - int(v: r._value)}))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["_start"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.status == "BLOCKED")
  |> group(columns: ["_start"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> count()

import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(bucket: "${bucket}", tag: "client")
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.status == "BLOCKED")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["domain"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.status == "BLOCKED")
  |> group(columns: ["domain"])
  |> count()
  |> group()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: count)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["status"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: count)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["status"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["reply_type"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["query_type"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}")
  |> group(columns: ["upstream"])
  |> count()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r._field == "reply_time_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r._field == "reply_time_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)
  |> set(key: "client", value: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r._field == "reply_time_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: median)
    |> set(key: "client", value: "median")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r._field == "reply_time_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
    |> aggregateWindow(
        every: 5m,
        fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables
            |> quantile(q: 0.9, method: "exact_selector"),
    )
    |> set(key: "client", value: "quantile 90%")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r._field == "reply_time_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
    |> aggregateWindow(
        every: 5m,
        fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables
            |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "exact_selector"),
    )
    |> set(key: "client", value: "quantile 95%")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r._field == "reply_time_ms")
  |> group(columns: ["client"])
    |> aggregateWindow(
        every: 5m,
        fn: (tables=<-, column) => tables
            |> quantile(q: 0.99, method: "exact_selector"),
    )
    |> set(key: "client", value: "quantile 99%")
